description:
It is possible to finish your thesis in 6 months, even if you don’t know what to write or haven’t finished your research. 

In this free course Scott Rank, PhD in history, distills the principles that helped him go from crippling writer’s block to writing 500-1000 words a day. In this course you will learn the following:  

  • A simple daily habit that will help you start writing your dissertation  
  • How to make it impossible not to write everyday  
  • How to write even if all your research isn’t finished  
  • How to get the most out of your advisor meetings  
  • How to get your friends actively help you finish, even if they aren’t academics.
title: Finish Your Thesis in Six Months
